content:
Separate communities have developed to investigate and build computer-based systems for automated deduction, computer algebra, mathematical publishing, and novel user interfaces. While these systems excel in their own right, their integration can lead to synergies offering significant added value. The Conference on Intelligent Computer Mathematics (CICM) offers a venue for discussing and developing solutions to the great challenges posed by the integration of these diverse areas.

https://cicm-conference.org/2025/cicm.php
